detectors.description:
Reentrancy in BlackJack.checkGameResult(BlackJack.Game,bool) (bad_randomness/blackjack/blackjack.sol#89-172):
	External calls:
	- ! msg.sender.send(game.bet * 2) (bad_randomness/blackjack/blackjack.sol#143)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- games[msg.sender].state = GameState.Player (bad_randomness/blackjack/blackjack.sol#145)
